pages.text: Cockroaches are tiny brown passive insects.$(br2)If near light or they are near players, they will free.$(br2)Cockroach may drop their Cockroach Wing Framgent on death, use nine of them to craft a full Cockroach Wing, that it's used as brewing ingredient of $(l:patchouli:potions/bug_pheromones)Potion of Bug Pheromones$(/l).

They can eat any food item dropped on the ground.$(br2)Cockroaches can be attracted with Sugar$(br2)Do you want to teach your tiny cute Cuckroach to dance? Then give it a $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/maraca)Maraca!$(/l)$(br2)You will need 3 wood, 1 stick and 1 Rattlesnake Rattle.
